data.title: XFile
data.text:
XFile Framework

XFile include three partï¼windows services ï¼windows clientï¼and android client.

XFile support both FTP and HTTP streams,but only our client program or application can call stream map function in the xfile server.

We have test some other software that can support xfile server through FTP protocol in windows platform:

File zilla client

cute ftp pro

Internet explorer [ need set utf-8 on]

Firefox

......

Pay attention: XFile is programed for home or small office use only, the maximum of users on line is less than 64 .
